parameters: No trouble from the prisoners today sir.
No - i'm sure you're in here for a reason
...yes I suppose. Was caught stealing some
Come on now, you don't expect me to believe
you've been locked up here for that - the King
Look, I'm hungry, will you please just give me
I won't hold my breath... but thanks all the
same. Anything from the food stores will do...

parameters.name: [Secondary] A Small Mercy
parameters.description: 1) Get the Prisoner some food from the stores

parameters: Description = 1) Get the Prisoner some food from the stores
I thought as much. Leave me alone.
Have you found anything for me to eat yet?
Here you go, enough for a couple of meals.
I'm surprised you followed though. Thank you
for your kindness. I don't have anything with
Don't worry - just show someone else the same

parameters.newDescription: 1) Get the Prisoner some food from the stores\n2) Bring the food to the Dungeons\n3) You fed the prisoner when you had the chance.
